mapper.update: UPDATE employee SET name = #{name}, gender = #{gender}, birth_date = #{birthDate}, hire_date = #{hireDate}, position = #{position}, department = #{department}, phone = #{phone}, email = #{email}, address = #{address}, status = #{status} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, name, gender, birth_date, hire_date, position, department, phone, email, address, status, created_at, updated_at FROM employee
SELECT id, name, gender, birth_date, hire_date, position, department, phone, email, address, status, created_at, updated_at FROM employee WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT id, name, gender, birth_date, hire_date, position, department, phone, email, address, status, created_at, updated_at FROM employee WHERE name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
SELECT id, name, gender, birth_date, hire_date, position, department, phone, email, address, status, created_at, updated_at FROM employee WHERE department = #{department}
